coreAttributes.name: Fruit Bat's Salad
coreAttributes.description: A little plastic pot, containing a delicious-looking fruit salad. Printed into the film lid, there's a little picture of a bat-girl sitting cross-legged as she eats her way through a mountain of fruit.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel [npc.her] arcane power increasing...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] off the film lid to the pot of Fruit Bat's Salad, before starting to eat the fruit contained within. The slices of orange, mango, and strawberry are all absolutely delicious, and it only takes [npc.herHim] a moment to finish off the entire pot.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] off the film lid to the pot of Fruit Bat's Salad, before presenting it to [npc2.name] and getting [npc2.herHim] to start eating the fruit contained within. The slices of orange, mango, and strawberry are all absolutely delicious, and it only takes [npc2.name] a moment to finish off the entire pot.
